content: Xiaobo ZHOU – Faculty of Science and Technology | University of Macau Skip to content Xiaobo ZHOU周笑波 Distinguished Professor Head of Department of Computer and Information Science Personal Homepage: https://www.fst.um.edu.mo/personal/waynexzhou/ Academic Qualifications Ph.D. in Computer Science, Nanjing University, China (2000) M.S. in Computer Science, Nanjing University, China (1997) B.S. in Computer Science, Nanjing University, China (1994) Research Research Interests Cloud Computing Systems for Machine Learning High-Performance Distributed Computing Memory Systems and OS Contact Details Faculty of Science and Technology University of Macau, E11 Avenida da Universidade, Taipa, Macau, China Room: E11-4090 Telephone: 8822-4137 Fax: (853) 8822-2426 Email: waynexzhou Page load link Go to Top
